label: 法華寺
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Buddhist temple in Nara, being the abbreviation for the Hokke-metsuzai-no-tera, which was the full name of the Kokubunni-ji (Atonement Nunnery of the Province) of Yamato-no-kuni. [奈良、法華滅罪寺、国分尼寺、大和国]
